Overview[]: Alves is a greedy and uncaring man. He is loyal to Sebastian for an easier life and has no problems with him sending 30-40 people to their deaths for money. His lack of care for other lives goes so far as to not caring about children, threatening to make Daryl and Rosita 's kids orphans. This greed leads to his death at the hands of Mercer .
Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Alves' life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point during the outbreak, Alves joined a community in Ohio. Alves and Castle pull Rosita and Daryl away from their assignment to investigate a herd of walkers on the north perimeter. Alves and Castle take Daryl and Rosita to the northern perimeter. Sebastian joins them and orders Daryl and Rosita to retrieve a stash of cash hidden in a house on the other side of the herd. Daryl's group meets up with Alves and Castle and learns that Sebastian has already sent 30 or 40 people to look for the cash. Mercer shoots Alves and Castle dead.
Death[]: Killed By Sebastian Milton (Indirectly Caused) Himself (Caused) Michael Mercer Due to having sacrificed 30-40 Commonwealth civilians in order to get money for Sebastian, he was shot in the head by Michael.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Alves has killed: April Martens (Caused) Himself (Caused) 30 to 40 unnamed Commonwealth residents (Caused) Numerous counts of zombies
Trivia[]: For reasons unknown, Alves and Castle were excluded from the "In Memoriam" segment on Talking Dead for " The Rotten Core ".
Name: Alves
